preconditions.precondition: The Depositor wants to access information about accepted items and formats.

successEndConditions.condition: The Depositor successfully views accepted item types and recommended formats.

mainSequence.step: Depositor accesses the repository information through the Web Interface.
Web Interface requests accepted items and formats from the EDRMS.
EDRMS retrieves item types and formats from the Format and Type Management system.
Format and Type Management system returns types and recommended formats to EDRMS.
Web Interface shows accepted item types and formats to the Depositor.
